alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 28 at 2:51PM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following counties, Glades and Hendry. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 246 PM EDT, Local law enforcement reported the water in the slough at bridge on Highway 29 just south of Highway 74 is about to spill over onto the highway in the warned area. Therefore, A flood warning has been extended for this area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southern Glades and Northwestern Hendry Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
